text: Clemens W. "Clem" Ruh (October 31, 1915 – October 5, 1973) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Hammond Ciesar All-Americans during the 1940–41 season and averaged 3.7 points per game. == References == Category:1915 births Category:1973 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Indiana Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Hammond Ciesar All- Americans players Category:USC Trojans men's basketball players
title: Clem Ruh
